parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The application ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListEdgeContainerApps](~~ListEdgeContainerApps~~) operation.

parameters.name: OrderKey
parameters.description:
The sorting field. Valid values:

*   CreateTime: the time when the domain name was associated.
*   CreateTime: the time when the domain name was last modified.

parameters.name: OrderType
parameters.description:
The order in which you want to sort the query results. Valid values:

*   ASC: in ascending order.
*   DESC: in descending order.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Valid values: **1** to **100000**. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 20. Valid values: 1 to 500.

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The keyword that is used for the search.
